review: FANTASTIC, EXCELLENT, I AM VERY DELIGHTED WITH MY PURCHASE IT IS THE RIGHT SIZE, WEIGHT AND VERY POWERFULL!!!!!!
author: Isauro O. Medina

review: My internet was to slow so Flynn buffered to much.  Also most Flynn cost $$$
author: e a wareham iii

review: It is VERY easy to use and offers a lot - although I really just wanted quick access to Netflix. The only bad thing was, with the touch of the wrong button I somehow inadvertently ordered Amazon prime. I didn't want this and now am in a position of having to figure out how to cancel.
author: Catherine Scholl "Teacher"

review: Bought another one for another TV. That's how much I like Fire TV Sticks.
author: llcpms

review: The Fire TV stick works well for what it is, but it's lacking in the apps department compared to Roku or Chromecast. It's tough to beat price-wise though.
author: Amazon Customer "tinmanx"
